Title: Blind Spot
Plot: Brody confronts the lone survivor among the insurgents that held him, leading Carrie to believe she may be proved right about Brody once and for all - but Brody's reunion with his captor surprises everyone; the agency is hot on the trail of the lovers who bought a house near the airport with funds from a stolen necklace.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: David Marciano, Maury Sterling, Navid Negahban, Amy Hargreaves, James Rebhorn, Waleed Zuaiter, Hrach Titizian
